channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: @Korean_Jedi @trishankkarthik @wendyweeww @nntaleb @ggreenwald @Snowden If he doesn’t have freedom of speech why should I trust anything he says?

@Korean_Jedi @trishankkarthik @wendyweeww @nntaleb @ggreenwald @Snowden His main interaction with the world outside Russia has been Twitter. On it, he routinely attacked the US without saying a word about his polonium-peddling, dissident-poisoning host country. I don’t know, you tell me how things may have evolved.

@Korean_Jedi @trishankkarthik @wendyweeww @nntaleb @ggreenwald @Snowden About the initial reasons, yes. It’s unfortunate he ended up in Russia. Once there, things may have evolved. And from his tweets over the past few years, it seems like they have.
@trishankkarthik @wendyweeww @Korean_Jedi @nntaleb @ggreenwald @Snowden Bingo. Hard to beleive Snowden was static, too.
@VPrasadMDMPH Great episode. Good thing Twitter isn't real life, or I'd be worried about Dr. Damania.

@trishankkarthik @nntaleb @ggreenwald @Snowden Count me in with those who changed their mind, yet again, thank to Taleb. Still not sure if he was an agent, a useful idiot doubling down on idiocy, or something in between. But the outcome is the same.
These are, in fact, quite good (or, to translate from Slavic to American: Absolutely Amazing!!!1!) https://t.co/UTq962kMu2
Calling this an “opinion” is a bit of a stretch, no? https://t.co/Xk7atsJjgq

@ManniMD1 @oncology_bg @AaronGoodman33 @VPrasadMDMPH Yep, that paragraph was exactly what I had in mind! Do you have names of the drugs tested as part of the dataset? That could help answer the question.

@ManniMD1 @oncology_bg @AaronGoodman33 @VPrasadMDMPH Interesting. The Wesson review (https://t.co/8hPhONLCrN) doesn't note the type of non-randomized trials that increased from 2015 to 2020, so hard to see why their explanation of decreased randomization should be accepted over something less nefarious, like more drugs being tested

Sve sam skoro bodove imao, poljoprivrednu školu… legalizovao objekte, godine… Sve sam imao, jednostavno… sklonili su me, nisam prošao -Zašto? Mislim zato što nisam bio u stranci… Ne znam, sve je to… zna se to unapred ko će da prođe. -Hoćeš ponovo konkurisati? Ne, nikad više. https://t.co/bZgFdh2wQe
